About Me

Let me tell a little about myself...

Hello everybody

My name is Harlindis. I am passionate about programming and front-end-developing. As an enthusiastic I relish challenges that motivate me to work harder while also providing learning opportunities. I can build responsive websites and user interfaces modern HTML5 and CSS3 technologies like Flexbox and CSS Grid as well as the Sass pre-compiler. I also can create layouts and utility classes to build custom responsive websites and app UIs. I also have a lot of knowledge about Javascript and React.
